tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE face_recognition ( 
    face_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    full_name VARCHAR(100), 
    age INT, 
    gender VARCHAR(10), 
    photo_url TEXT, 
    known_face BOOLEAN 
);
CREATE TABLE Persons (person_id INT PRIMARY KEY, person_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, person_age INT, person_gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Faces (face_id INT PRIMARY KEY, face_image BYTEA NOT NULL, face_encoding TEXT NOT NULL, person_id INT REFERENCES Persons(person_id));
CREATE TABLE Interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100), person_id INT REFERENCES Persons(person_id));
CREATE TABLE Alerts (alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY, alert_message VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, person_id INT REFERENCES Persons(person_id));
CREATE TABLE KnownFaces (known_face_id INT PRIMARY KEY, face_encoding TEXT NOT NULL, person_id INT REFERENCES Persons(person_id));
